tweets.text: Just to remind you all that just 24 hours ago the @EnvAgency admitted it will no longer be publishing serious pollution incidents and won't be recording them against their annual performance targets. https://t.co/Cu3VPjycTa

urls.title: Report an environmental incident
urls.description: How to report environmental incidents, including pollution

tweets.text:
We love your tweets, but we're unable to pursue reports of environmental incidents online.

If you see river debris/pollution, or suspect illegal activity like waste crime or unlicensed fishing...

Please call us, free and 24 hours: 0800 807060

More here: https://t.co/6k3lpwgLOn https://t.co/6XSTnqlzQZ

#Didyouknow as part of the #A120 #LittleHadhamBypass scheme we are working in partnership with the @EnvAgency to provide protection to #LittleHadham residents and downstream communities from being flooded by the River Ash, Albury Tributary and Lloyd Taylor Drain https://t.co/o6xJ8pejRB

urls.title: Flood warnings for England - GOV.UK
urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, river and sea levels, check the 5-day forecast or use flood risk maps

tweets.text:
There are still #flood warnings and flood alerts in place across #Cumbria and heavy showers are expected this evening. 

Are you prepared? Check the latest situation in your area and sign up to our free flood warnings: https://t.co/uGQ4g6A5Xn https://t.co/vVurIbgb6z

@AMVYaYa @BucksCouncil @EnvAgencyAnglia @StPeterVillage @thameswater You would need to speak to your local councillor about that - there are specific triggers that need to be met such as the number of houses and businesses flooded internally.

Rafts of woody debris in the Thames now the floods have gone down.

We've been planting trees around the Memorial Gardens in #York, to replace four trees we took out in 2019 to create space to build flood defences. For every tree we remove on the #YorkFAS we are planting five new trees.

tweets.text:
Could anyone please advise why DEFRA Sandy monitor which covers #Herts & #Beds network is no longer measuring PM2.5? Data has not been available from this monitor for 47 days so far this year. 
@DefraGovUK @EnvAgency @CleanAirLondon https://t.co/4mLJKWrZ9C

The @EnvAgency head says that the climate emergency is hitting ‚Äúworst case scenario‚Äù levels.

5.2 million homes and businesses in England are already at risk of flooding.

Government must urgently reduce emissions and up its game on climate adaptation here and internationally.

urls.title: Climate crisis hitting 'worst case scenarios', warns Environment Agency
urls.description: Sir James Bevan says extreme flooding in UK indicates urgent need for change if humanity is to survive

tweets.text: 'The #climateemergency is already hitting ‚Äúworst case scenario‚Äù levels that if left unchecked will lead to the collapse of ecosystems, with dire consequences for humanity.' Governments & politicians have failed us. We need real people to make the decisions https://t.co/jItGS5M9UW

tweets.text: For 9 days @CanalRiverTrust have REFUSED to accept that oil pollution is coming from Furness Vale Marina. They also told me today that there is no pollution by the marina or by Bridge 30. This video shows the EXACT source (at 7 seconds) in the marina and that it's STILL leaking! https://t.co/Kwx2EKKsUi

Today for #invasivespeciesweek it‚Äôs White poplar. üå≥ 
Now naturalised having been introduced from Southern Europe, this tree was planted in coastal areas to help stabilise. Spreads rapidly, we dig out using tree poppers. @Lancswildlife @fyldecouncil @LivingSeasNW @EnvAgencyNW https://t.co/mqKPLrCYqE

Tankering sewage around is cheaper than sorting out the causes and the failed sewage system @thameswater  The @EnvAgency and @ofwat condone it so the customer and environment take the hit @sandralaville @GeorgeMonbiot @robertcourts  This was a delivery TO Eynsham Oxon today. https://t.co/VTX0ALbYf1

urls.title: Extinction: Freshwater fish in 'catastrophic' decline
urls.description: Numbers are plunging due to pollution, unsustainable fishing and the draining of rivers.
